text: Claude-Gérard Marcus (24 August 1933 – 24 July 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly from 1968 to 1997. He was born in Paris. He was a member of the Union of Democrats for the Republic. Marcus died on 24 July 2020 in Paris, aged 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Claude-Gérard Marcus
